subject: Heart Of Dreams
text:
Give me a dream of my own 
To keep in my heart.  
That will never part 
For dreams are many things.  
That go on all through life 
God put dreams in your 
Heart so get up and fight 
Because there is no doubt  
Your dreams won't come true 
If you don't make it a golden rule 
That is why dreams 
Just come true for a few 
So keep a dream in your heart 
For dreams are yours 
So grow old with them 
And never let them part.
